label: 案
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Draft or copy of a document, normally identifiable by the absence of an authorizing monogram (kaō). Considered by historians as hardly less valuable than a signed document. The term anmon often appears in document texts in contradistinction to shōmon, which is a document original.　[花押、正文]
